description: The PSA Scholarship is offered by the Photographic Society of America for students majoring in photography. The society fosters personal growth and expression, creativity, excellence, and ethical conduct in all aspects of photographic endeavor. Eligibility Requirements Photographic Arts major Junior or Senior standing Minimum 2.5 GPA

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
